Description:

Prorva to fight through 30 missions futuristic fighting the Covenant. 
Explore the origins of the program Spartan operation known for Halo 4.
Time to join the squad, spartan!

Features:

Epic campaign, comprising 30 full levels of dynamism. Events taking place 
in the new storyline - to the main story of Halo 4.
Use your favorite weapons, vehicles and armor properties of Halo! Modify 
your Spartan and create the perfect warrior!
Follow the weekly tasks to obtain GS, and fight for the best position on 
the leaderboard.
The game supports keyboard / mouse, gamepad Xbox USB and virtual touch joystick.
